metadata.title: CVE-2024-24898 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability inopenEuler kernel on Linux allows Resource Leak Exposure. This vulnerabilityis associated with program fileshttps://gitee.Com/openeuler/kernel/blob/openEuler-1.0-LTS/drivers/staging/gmjstcm/tcm.C.This issue affects kernel: from 4.19.90-2109.1.0.0108 before4.19.90-2403.4.0.0244.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needs-triage').
